metadata.synopsis: Ketheric comments on Nightsong being freed from her soul cage in the Colony, after the combat has already started, in his human form/first phase.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to lower Colony in SCL_Main_A, to the Ketheric Showdown boss chamber ("oe KethericShowdown_Start"). This dialog will trigger if Nightsong is freed after the Ketheric combat has already started, in his first phase.
